statements: SELECT * FROM blockchain_participants;
SELECT username, reputation FROM blockchain_participants;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_participants WHERE reputation > 100;
SELECT username FROM blockchain_participants ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_participants ORDER BY reputation DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_participants WHERE reputation > 100 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT participant_id, username FROM blockchain_participants WHERE username ILIKE 'A%' ORDER BY participant_id;
SELECT participant_id, username, reputation FROM blockchain_participants WHERE reputation BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY participant_id ASC;
SELECT participant_id, username, reputation FROM blockchain_participants WHERE username = 'john_doe' ORDER BY reputation DESC;
SELECT COUNT(participant_id) AS total_participants, AVG(reputation) AS avg_reputation FROM blockchain_participants;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_participants;
SELECT participant_name, reputation_score, participant_id FROM blockchain_participants ORDER BY participant_id DESC;
SELECT participant_name, reputation_score FROM blockchain_participants WHERE reputation_score > 50;
SELECT participant_name, event_date, event_description FROM reputation_events ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT participant_name, event_description FROM blockchain_participants LEFT JOIN reputation_events ON blockchain_participants.participant_id = reputation_events.participant_id;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_participants;
SELECT participant_name, reputation_score FROM blockchain_participants ORDER BY reputation_score DESC;

SELECT participant_id, participant_name, event_date FROM blockchain_participants JOIN reputation_events ON blockchain_participants.participant_id = reputation_events.participant_id ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name FROM blockchain_participants WHERE reputation_score > 50;
SELECT DISTINCT participant_id, participant_name FROM blockchain_participants WHERE reputation_score < 50;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_participants ORDER BY participant_name DESC;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name, reputation_score FROM blockchain_participants WHERE participant_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM reputation_history WHERE change_type = 'increase' ORDER BY change_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, reputation_score FROM blockchain_participants WHERE reputation_score > 8 ORDER BY reputation_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_participants;
SELECT participant_name, reputation_score FROM blockchain_participants ORDER BY reputation_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;

SELECT participant_name, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_transactions FROM blockchain_participants JOIN transactions ON blockchain_participants.participant_id = transactions.participant_id GROUP BY participant_name;

SELECT participant_name, SUM(change_value) AS total_change FROM blockchain_participants JOIN reputation_history ON blockchain_participants.participant_id = reputation_history.participant_id WHERE change_type = 'increase' GROUP BY participant_name HAVING total_change > 500;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_participants;
SELECT participant_name, reputation_score FROM blockchain_participants ORDER BY reputation_score DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT block_id, block_hash, block_timestamp FROM blocks ORDER BY block_timestamp DESC;
SELECT chain_id, block_id, transaction_id FROM block_chain WHERE chain_id < 100;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_participants;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name FROM blockchain_participants WHERE reputation_score > 50 ORDER BY participant_name ASC;
SELECT participant_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY participant_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT block_id, block_hash, COUNT(transaction_id) AS num_transactions FROM blocks JOIN block_chain ON blocks.block_id = block_chain.block_id GROUP BY block_id ORDER BY num_transactions DESC;

SELECT b.block_id, b.block_timestamp, t.transaction_amount FROM blocks b JOIN block_chain bc ON b.block_id = bc.block_id JOIN transactions t ON bc.transaction_id = t.transaction_id WHERE t.transaction_amount > 500 ORDER BY b.block_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Participants;
SELECT participant_name, reputation_score FROM Participants ORDER BY reputation_score DESC;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name, reputation_score FROM Participants WHERE reputation_score > 100;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 500 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_hash, transaction_amount FROM Transactions WHERE participant_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM Participants;
SELECT participant_name, reputation_score FROM Participants WHERE reputation_score > 100;

SELECT participant_name, reward_type, reward_amount FROM Participants JOIN ParticipantRewards ON Participants.participant_id = ParticipantRewards.participant_id JOIN Rewards ON ParticipantRewards.reward_id = Rewards.reward_id;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, participant_name FROM Transactions JOIN Participants ON Transactions.participant_id = Participants.participant_id;
SELECT * FROM TransactionsHistory WHERE transaction_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
